cards.title: Armsmaster
powers: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an Equipment card, put it in your hand; otherwise shuffle it back.
incapacitatedAbilities: {ArmsmasterCharacter} deals 1 irreducible melee damage to a target.
One player may search their trash for an Equipment card and put it in their hand.

cards.title: Accelerator
body: Attach this card to a Halberd, either as Primary or Secondary.

activatableAbilities.name: primary
activatableAbilities.text: All heroes may draw a card.

activatableAbilities.name: secondary
activatableAbilities.text: A hero other than Armsmaster may play a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Let's see how quickly you respond to {BR}classical conditioning. Every time you try{BR}to run, I'll do something like that.

cards.title: Combat Prediction Array
body: Attach this card to a Halberd, either as Primary or Secondary.

activatableAbilities.name: primary
activatableAbilities.text: Reveal the top 3 cards of the villain deck and put them back in any order.

activatableAbilities.name: secondary
activatableAbilities.text: Until the start of your next turn, reduce damage dealt to Armsmaster by villain cards by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: I know exactly what you're going to do{BR}next. You're going to try to catch me{BR}from behind with a wave.

cards.title: Communicator
body: Attach this card to a Halberd, either as Primary or Secondary.

activatableAbilities.name: primary
activatableAbilities.text: A hero other than Armsmaster may use a power.

activatableAbilities.name: secondary
activatableAbilities.text: A hero other than Armsmaster may play a card.

cards.flavorText: They could communicate without talking.{BR}Some kind of system built into their masks.

cards.title: Dual Wielding
body: Use a power on a Halberd.
cards.flavorText: Armsmaster fighting toe to toe with{BR}Leviathan, a Halberd in each hand.

cards.title: Equipment Stash
body: Search your deck for an Equipment card and either put it into play or into your hand. Shuffle your deck.
cards.flavorText: A set of Halberds were placed on a {BR}rack behind Armsmaster's desk, one{BR}shattered in pieces.

cards.title: Experimental Halberd
powers: {ArmsmasterCharacter} may deal 1 irreducible energy damage to a target. You may activate a [u]Primary[/u] text on a Module attached to this card as Primary. You may activate a [u]Secondary[/u] text on a Module attached to this card as Secondary.
cards.body: Modules may be attached to this card; one primary and one secondary.
cards.flavorText: The head was surrounded by a strange{BR}blur that seemed static, unmoving{BR}around the blade and point.

cards.title: Flamethrower
body: Attach this card to a Halberd, either as Primary or Secondary.

activatableAbilities.name: primary
activatableAbilities.text: {ArmsmasterCharacter} deals 2 fire damage to a non-hero target.

activatableAbilities.name: secondary
activatableAbilities.text: Destroy an Environment card.

cards.flavorText: The system used light for its circuits,{BR}rather than electricity, and it generated{BR}a lot of heat as a byproduct.

cards.title: Grapple
body: Attach this card to a Halberd, either as Primary or Secondary.

activatableAbilities.name: primary
activatableAbilities.text: {ArmsmasterCharacter} deals 1 projectile damage to up to 2 non-hero targets.

activatableAbilities.name: secondary
activatableAbilities.text: Destroy an Ongoing card.

cards.flavorText: He whipped the chain to shift the sphere's{BR}trajectory, and simultaneously opened it{BR}into its oversized grappling hook form.

cards.title: Grapple Halberd
powers: You may destroy an environment card. You may activate a [u]Primary[/u] text on a Module attached to this card as Primary. You may activate a [u]Secondary[/u] text on a Module attached to this card as Secondary.
cards.body: Modules may be attached to this card; one primary and one secondary.
cards.flavorText: It looked as though he flew up onto{BR}the roof, but the six-foot long weapon{BR}the man held kind of jerked as he landed.

cards.title: Medicator
body: Attach this card to a Halberd, either as Primary or Secondary.

activatableAbilities.name: primary
activatableAbilities.text: All hero targets regain 1 HP.

activatableAbilities.name: secondary
activatableAbilities.text: Armsmaster regains 2 HP.

flavorQuotes.text: What I think is that the tranquilizers{BR}that you pumped into his system{BR}knocked out his ability to heal.

cards.title: Original Halberd
powers: Armsmaster may deal 2 melee damage to a target. You may activate a [u]Primary[/u] text on a Module attached to this card as Primary. You may activate a [u]Secondary[/u] text on a Module attached to this card as Secondary.
cards.body: Modules may be attached to this card; one primary and one secondary.
cards.flavorText: His trademark and weapon was{BR}his Halberd, which was basically a spear{BR}with an axe head on the end.

cards.title: Quick Adjustment
body: At the end of your turn you may return a Module in play to your hand. If you do, you may play a Module.
Whenever an Equipment card would be destroyed you may destroy this card instead.

flavorQuotes.text: Armsmaster told him to wear ear{BR}buds, so Dauntless can't hear anyone{BR}but him. That's both brilliant and{BR}incredibly depressing.

cards.title: Recycler
body: Attach this card to a Halberd, either as Primary or Secondary.

activatableAbilities.name: primary
activatableAbilities.text: Draw a card.

activatableAbilities.name: secondary
activatableAbilities.text: Activate the [u]Secondary[/u] text of another Module attached to the card this card is attached to.

cards.flavorText: Efficiency, detail and effective use{BR}of waste were critical aspects of{BR}his particular brand of tinkering.

cards.title: Return In A Flash
body: Reveal cards from the top of your deck or your trash until you reveal a Halberd. Either put it into play or into your hand. Return the other cards and shuffle your deck.
cards.flavorText: It disappeared into a storm of{BR}glowing blue lines as it reached the{BR}peak of its ascent, simultaneously{BR}rematerializing in his hand.

cards.title: Stasis Effector
body: Attach this card to a Halberd, either as Primary or Secondary.

activatableAbilities.name: primary
activatableAbilities.text: Discard 2 cards. If you do, skip the next villain play phase; and until the start of your next turn all villain character cards are immune to damage.

activatableAbilities.name: secondary
activatableAbilities.text: Destroy a target with 4 or less HP.

flavorQuotes.text: For the record, that last trick was{BR}a temporal stasis trigger.

cards.title: Static Field Generator
body: Attach this card to a Halberd, either as Primary or Secondary.

activatableAbilities.name: primary
activatableAbilities.text: {ArmsmasterCharacter} deals 2 lightning damage to a non-hero target.

activatableAbilities.name: secondary
activatableAbilities.text: {ArmsmasterCharacter} deals 1 lightning damage to all targets with 3 or less HP.

cards.flavorText: The entire cafeteria flinched at{BR}the crackle of electricity that ripped{BR}through the air around him.

cards.title: Survey Halberd
powers: Draw a card. You may activate a [u]Primary[/u] text on a Module attached to this card as Primary. You may activate a [u]Secondary[/u] text on a Module attached to this card as Secondary.
cards.body: Modules may be attached to this card; one primary and one secondary.

flavorQuotes.text: Let's see... to deal with my buddy{BR}Grue, you've made that thing a fancy{BR}tuning stick.

cards.title: Targeting Computer
body: Attach this card to a Halberd, either as Primary or Secondary.

activatableAbilities.name: primary
activatableAbilities.text: Select a hero target. The next time that hero target would deal damage, increase the damage by 1 and make it irreducible.

activatableAbilities.name: secondary
activatableAbilities.text: Select a target. At the start of Armsmaster's next turn, he deals that target 4 projectile damage.

cards.flavorText: The lens of his right eye clicked through{BR}multiple frequencies and resolutions,{BR}until the scene stood out in high detail.
